name: Category of Posts
author: Linda MacPhee-Cobb

sections.description:
This will create a list of all your posts in one specific category. They will be ordered alphabetically by category.
You can put this as a list in your side bar, a page or a post
sections.installation:
1) Download, unzip, upload to your plugin directory and active the plugin.

2) Go into your Admin page find Options->Posts by category

3) Put the number of the category you want to list in the box and click ‘Update options’
